name: Departure Lounge 1971
description:
Departure Lounge 1971 was created in late 2009, made it into our store in 2010, was picked up by IKEA and sold worldwide in 2011, and now after a little rest, we have it back in stock.  And we're both very excited about that!

It's one of our favourite designs, I think there's a fair bit of nostalgia for us as it was one of our earlier pieces. It reminds us of our childhoods too, and that's not a bad thing in this case. 

This is a reproduction giclee print from the original gouache painting + collage. Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, available in the larger format.

Printed area: 38cm x 50.5cm 
Paper size: 42cm x 59cm (A2)

The second image shows the printed area in full.

Each print is hand signed, and titled with inaluxe logo and year of creation on the lower right front border.

Presented in an archival cello sleeve and shipped with care in a sturdy tube.

©inaluxe: Kristina Sostarko + Jason Odd

name: Lover
description:
For the lovers of this world, this one is for you. 

This is a reproduction print taken from the original gouache painting + collage. Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, available in the larger format.

name: Press Close Together
description:
It's all about the joy of rain.  The title comes from early 17th century: from late Latin condensatio(n-), from condensare 'press close together' 
 
This is a reproduction print taken from the original gouache painting + collage. Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, available in two sizes. STANDARD and LARGE.

STANDARD: Paper size is A4 (21cm x 29.7cm). Printed area is sized to fit in an 8" x 10" opening or matt. The title, year, and logo appear on a white border. 

Presented in an acid free archival cello sleeve in a nifty folder, and shipped in a bend proof mailer.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

LARGE: Paper size is approximately 42cm x 55cm, and the printed area/design measures approximately 35cm x 43.5cm. these larger prints have a generous border, and are hand signed with hand written title, inaluxe logo and date.

Presented in an archival cello sleeve and shipped with care in a sturdy tube.

©inaluxe: Kristina Sostarko + Jason Odd

name: Garden Party
description:
Thanks to science we now know that plants communicate with one another.  It's quite amazing when you think about it... and so, here is a garden party. Complete with chitter chatter. What is your garden up to today? 

This is a reproduction print taken from the original gouache painting on birch.  Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, available in two sizes -

description:
Atlas 59 is the first of a new series of the planet from afar.  One of the things we love is to fly, and there is nothing quite as abstract as the world from a plane.

name: Message No.9
description:
Message No.9 is from the 'Message In A Bottle' series which looks at the idea of a message being visual, rather than a literal word, or sentence.  Ideally this perspective encourages each person to interact with the work in their own way, and therefore bring something personal to the experience.  

This is a reproduction print taken from the original gouache painting on birch & mixed media collage/assembly.  Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, available in two sizes. STANDARD and LARGE.

STANDARD: Paper size is A4 (21cm x 29.7cm). Printed area is sized to fit in an 8" x 10" opening or matt. The title, year, and logo appear on a white border.

description:
These little feathered friends come and visit our garden all the time, and they are so teeny small - they are amazing! They have the most beautiful bright blue colours, and sweet song. 

This design coincides with the release of the latest card range we designed for Earth Greetings - including this little guy! 

This is a reproduction print taken from the original gouache painting. Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, on A4 size paper, with a white border surround. Printed area is sized to fit in an 8" x 10" matt.

The Tale of Mr Cat is an ode to our very own furry friends.    To the family cats  who changed our lives, and for cats & cat lovers the world over.

name: Composition I
description:
We've had so much fun exploring what music might look like, we imagine this answer is as infinite as music itself, but we had to have a stab at the question, and we created this piece - Composition I. A fun process, and one that instantly made us want spin some vinyl.

This is a reproduction print taken from the original mixed media collage. Professionally printed to gallery standard on 300gsm velvet matt art paper with Epson Ultrachrome K3 inks, on A4 size paper, with a white border surround. Printed area is sized to fit in an 8" x 10" matt.

Title and date on front white border - open edition.

Presented in an acid free archival cello sleeve with added boxboard, and then into a nifty inaluxe folder, all carefully shipped in a bend proof mailer all over the world.

©inaluxe: Kristina Sostarko + Jason Odd
